entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6 except 10 south of Hare Bay. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 6 except 10 south of Hare Bay. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
